original_text: But the more they afflicted them, the more they multiplied and grew. And they were grieved because of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 그러나 학대를 받을수록 더욱 번성하여 퍼져나가니 애굽 사람이 이스라엘 자손으로 말미암아 근심하여

sentences.original_text: But the more they afflicted them
the more they multiplied and grew
because of the children of Israel
